title: Vehicle Pursuit Dashcam video and body camera (Clayton County Police Department)

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Vehicle Pursuit Dashcam video and body camera (Clayton County Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of dashcam and or bodycam video of police pursuits from 01/02/2021 to 01/02/2024.  I would like vehicle and foot pursuits.  Please include an abbreviated processing note for each video

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael Faulkner

communications.subject: 24-0758: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Vehicle Pursuit Dashcam video and body camera (Clayton County Police Department)
communications.communication:
Good Morning,

We are in receipt of your request. Upon review of our database, I have located 40 cases. However, please allow up to two weeks to perform a case status search for each case. Once that process is completed, I will send an estimated completion time and cost.

Respectfully,



[https://www.claytoncountyga.gov/Home/ShowImage?id=6697&t=637334251236970000]
Alyson Crews
Police Records Custodian
Records Division
Clayton County Police Department
[https://www.claytoncountyga.gov/Home/ShowImage?id=6703&t=637334251248833442]770-477-3640
[https://www.claytoncountyga.gov/Home/ShowImage?id=6711&t=637334251270709226]alyson.crews@claytoncountyga.gov
7911 N. McDonough St. Jonesboro, Ga 30236
